sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const Cart = ({ cartItems, removeFromCart, updateQuantity, clearCart }) => { const totalPrice = cartItems.reduce((total, item) => total + item.price * item.quantity, 0) const totalItems = cartItems.reduce((total, item) => total + item.quantity, 0) return (
{cartItems.length > 0 ? ( <>
{cartItems.map((item, index) => (
{' '}
{item.foodName}
{item.foodRestaurant}
₹{item.price.toFixed(2)}
{item.quantity}
removeFromCart(item)}>
))}
Total Items: {totalItems}
Total Price: ₹{totalPrice.toFixed(2)}
) : (
No items in the cart
Add Items
Scroll like a{' '} foodie
)}
) } export default Cart
